title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API and Docker support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, stream, embeddings, and model management with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat endpoints in chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive APIs; Maven Central available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and delete models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline copilots or chat panels.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and persistent storage.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU and GPU (NVIDIA) setups plus Open WebUI addon.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and strongly-typed models; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with tokio-based async client and serde serialization.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and push models with idiomatic Go APIs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; mention the bot or use app commands to chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarizing notes, brainstorming, and Q&A.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing the JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for the Python client supporting sync, async, and embedding APIs.
